verbs.description: [ARG1: asian shares] [V: slide] [ARGM-CAU: on worries over us - china relations asian markets] tumbled monday as traders feared that president donald trump only reported progress in trade talks with china to score political points as the u s midterm elections draw near keeping score japan nikkei 225 index fell 1 2 percent at 21 985 05 and south korea kospi dropped 1 6 percent to 2 059 60 hong kong hang seng index slipped 2 4 percent to 25 891 48 the shanghai composite index shed 1 percent to 2 649 21 the s&p asx 200 in australia fell 0 1 percent to 5 841 70 shares fell in taiwan and singapore but rose in the philippines white house beijing lawrence kudlow apple new york mercantile exchange london japan taiwan russell stephen innes analyst new york brent crude south korea australia empire of japan singapore u s donald trump larry kudlow president donald trump hong kong philippines economic adviser xi jinping kospi
